title: Appealing 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath in Lakeview, Available: 9/15/2022
posting_body: Awesome three bedroom, two bathroom duplex in East Lakeview features cooking gas included, rehabbed kitchen, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, separate dining area, spacious living room, built in AC unit, hardwood floors, large bedrooms, great closet space, rehabbed bathroom, laundry in unit, and pets are welcome!
Please text Molly Parshall at 262/402-8414‬ to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 22930.
